I'll give a detailed and easy explanation to how u can make this game run smoothly with windows XP.

1. explore the Broken Sword II - CD1.iso and Broken Sword II - CD2.iso files. I used daemontools to explore them. Rename the files that has the same name (font.clu speech.clu and music.clu) to speech1.clu (on cd1) and speech2.clu (on cd2) and do the same with music.clu and font.clu.

2. Now copy the contents of the Broken Sword II - CD1.iso and Broken Sword II - CD2.iso files to a folder of your choise.

3. Now copy the cd.inf file found in the Sword2 folder to the folder named Clusters.

4. Download the latest version of ScummVM (if u dont allrdy have it) and the Broken Sword 2 cutscenes from ScummVM's homepage http://www.scummvm.org/

5. Extract the Broken Sword 2 cutscenes pack to the clusters folder, the same folder u copied the cd.inf file to.

6. Now start ScummVM, click "add game" then browse your way to the Clusters folder u installed the cutscenes and cd.inf to. Then click "choose" then click "ok" and then click "start game".

The game will now run perfectly with full speech, sound fx, music and cutscenes, and u dont need to burn anything to a cd. I tried to explain this as thoroughly and easy as possible, but if theres any questions to my guide here, feel free to ask. Have fun with Broken Sword 2 :)

PS. If u'r having problems getting the first game in the series to run aswell u can follow these same steps and it will work fine:)
